title: Fire Dancer
description: An alternate cover edition can be found here.At her birth, flames had licked around her skin, flickering over her infant form and glittering in the darkness of the birthing chamber. The Pyromancer declared her one of five contenders for the crown. She became a Princess of Fire. She learned how to control her flames, to harness them and how to lead as Queen. Locked away and safe from corruption, she met her people, each day receiving a new tutor from the citizens of Titaia. Training from birth for the tasks ahead; she always felt alone. At sixteen, she is ready. Kenna stands, one of five princesses, ready to compete for the crown of Pyyrhos. Who can win? What will be the price? Will she stand with her sisters, or move against them in pursuit of the throne?
author: Echo Fox
